trans-unit.source: Represents an elliptical arc between two points.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en elliptisk bue mellom to punkt.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> object to store ArcSegment objects and other segments.
trans-unit.target: Bruk en <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>objektet til å lagre ArcSegment objekter og andre segmenter.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: An elliptical arc is defined by its start and end points, x- and y-radius, x-axis rotation factor, a value indicating whether the arc should be greater than 180 degrees, and a value describing the direction in which the arc is drawn.
trans-unit.target: En elliptisk bue er definert av den start- og sluttpunktet, x - og y-radius, x-aksen rotasjon faktoren, en verdi som angir om buen må være større enn 180 grader og en verdi som beskriver retningen som buen tegnes.

trans-unit.source: The ArcSegment class does not contain a property for the starting point of the arc; it only defines the destination point of the arc it represents.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ArcSegment inneholder ikke en egenskap for startpunktet for buen; bare delbanen buen den representerer målet punktet.

trans-unit.source: The beginning point of the arc is the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> to which the ArcSegment is added.
trans-unit.target: Startpunktet buen er gjeldende punktet i <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>til ArcSegment legges.</xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>

trans-unit.source: The following illustrations demonstrate the different end point, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen viser annen endepunktet <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle%2A>innstillinger.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different Point settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "ArcSegments with different Point settings") ![ArcSegments with different Size settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "ArcSegments with different Size settings") ![ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings") ## IsLargeArc and SweepDirection For most arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> properties indicate which arc to use.
trans-unit.target: ![ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger")![ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger for størrelse](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger for størrelse")![ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger for RotationAngle](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger for RotationAngle") ## IsLargeArc og SweepDirection For de fleste buer for en bestemt plassering, størrelse og rotasjon, det er fire forskjellige buer kan tegnes; den <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>egenskapene angir hvilken bue skal brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>

trans-unit.source: Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less.
trans-unit.target: På fire candidate bue-sweeps to representerer store buer med sweeps 180 grader eller senere, og to representerer mindre buer med sweeps 180 grader eller mindre.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>er **true**, er ett av de to større bue sweeps valgte; ellers, hvis er **false**, én for mindre arc sweeps er valgt.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>

trans-unit.source: The remaining two arc candidates are each drawn in a different direction: <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Gjenværende to bue kandidater hver tegnes i en annen retning: <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> property specifies which one to use.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>egenskapen angir hvilket som skal brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustrations show different <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> settings.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen viser forskjellige <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>innstillinger.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings") ArcSegment objects with different IsLargeArc settings ![ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings") ArcSegment objects with different SweepDirection settings ## Freezable Features An ArcSegment is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: ![ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger for IsLargeArc](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger for IsLargeArc") ArcSegment objekter med ulike innstillinger for IsLargeArc ![ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger for SweepDirection](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger for SweepDirection") ArcSegment objekter med ulike innstillinger for SweepDirection ## Freezable funksjoner en ArcSegment er en type <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>Funksjoner, for eksempel fryse og kloning, kan du se den [oversikt over Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>, to which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> is added.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>klassen definerer bare målet punktet buen den representerer; startpunktet buen er gjeldende punktet i <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>, som den <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>er lagt til.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>

trans-unit.source: For most elliptical arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the `largeArc` and `sweepDirection` parameters indicate which arc to use.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes fire forskjellige buer kan tegnes; for mest elliptiske buer for en bestemt plassering, størrelse og rotasjon den `largeArc` og `sweepDirection` parametere angi bue som skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less.
trans-unit.target: På fire candidate bue-sweeps to representerer store buer med sweeps 180 grader eller senere, og to representerer mindre buer med sweeps 180 grader eller mindre.

trans-unit.source: If `largeArc` is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if `largeArc` is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `largeArc` er **true**, er ett av de to større bue sweeps valgte; ellers, hvis `largeArc` er **false**, én for mindre arc sweeps er valgt.

trans-unit.source: If `sweepDirection` is <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>, the arc is drawn in a positive-angle direction.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `sweepDirection` er <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>, buen tegnes med retningen positive vinkelen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>

trans-unit.source: If `sweepDirection` is <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>, the arc is drawn in a negative-angle direction.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `sweepDirection` er <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>, buen tegnes i en negativ vinkelen retning.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>, to which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> is added.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>klassen definerer bare målet punktet buen den representerer; startpunktet buen er gjeldende punktet i <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>, som den <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>er lagt til.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>

trans-unit.source: For most elliptical arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the `largeArc` and `sweepDirection` parameters indicate which arc to use.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes fire forskjellige buer kan tegnes; for mest elliptiske buer for en bestemt plassering, størrelse og rotasjon den `largeArc` og `sweepDirection` parametere angi bue som skal brukes.

trans-unit.source: Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less.
trans-unit.target: På fire candidate bue-sweeps to representerer store buer med sweeps 180 grader eller senere, og to representerer mindre buer med sweeps 180 grader eller mindre.

trans-unit.source: If `largeArc` is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if `largeArc` is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `largeArc` er **true**, er ett av de to større bue sweeps valgte; ellers, hvis `largeArc` er **false**, én for mindre arc sweeps er valgt.

trans-unit.source: If `sweepDirection` is <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>, the arc is drawn in a positive-angle direction.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `sweepDirection` er <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>, buen tegnes med retningen positive vinkelen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>

trans-unit.source: If `sweepDirection` is <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>, the arc is drawn in a negative-angle direction.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `sweepDirection` er <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>, buen tegnes i en negativ vinkelen retning.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>

trans-unit.source: The destination point of the arc; the start point of the arc is defined as the current point of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"></xref> to which the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"></xref> is added.
trans-unit.target: Målet punktet buen; startpunktet buen er definert som gjeldende punktet i <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PathFigure"> </xref> som den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"> </xref> er lagt til.

trans-unit.source: The x- and y-radius of the arc.
trans-unit.target: X - og y-radien til buen.

trans-unit.source: The x-radius is specified by the <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> structure's <xref:System.Windows.Size.Width*> property, and the y-radius is specified by the <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> structure's <xref:System.Windows.Size.Height*> property.
trans-unit.target: X-radiusen er angitt i den <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> strukturen for <> </> *> egenskapen og y-radiusen er angitt i den <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> strukturen for <> </> *> egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: The x-axis rotation of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: X-aksen roteringen for ellipsen.

trans-unit.source: Whether the arc should be greater than 180 degrees.
trans-unit.target: Om buen må være større enn 180 grader.

trans-unit.source: Set to <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"></xref> to draw the arc in a positive angle direction; set to <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"></xref> to draw the arc in a negative angle direction.
trans-unit.target: Satt til <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"> </xref> til å tegne buen i en positiv vinkel retningen; satt til <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"> </xref> til å tegne buen i en negativ vinkel retning.

trans-unit.source: Set to `true` to stroke the arc when a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"></xref> is used to render the segment; otherwise, `false`.
trans-unit.target: Satt til `true` til å tegne langs buen når en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Pen"> </xref> er brukt til å gjengi segmentet; ellers, `false`.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"> </xref>, gjør dype kopier av verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Når du kopierer avhengighetsegenskaper, denne metoden kopierer ressursen referanser og data bindinger (men de kan ikke løse) men ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment"> </xref> objektet gjør dype kopier av gjeldende verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Refererer til ressursen, databindinger og animasjoner kopieres ikke, men er gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the arc should be greater than 180 degrees.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om buen må være større enn 180 grader.

trans-unit.source: For most arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the IsLargeArc and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> properties indicate which arc to use.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes fire forskjellige buer kan tegnes; for de fleste buer for en bestemt plassering, størrelse og rotasjon IsLargeArc og <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>egenskapene angir hvilken bue skal brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less.
trans-unit.target: På fire candidate bue-sweeps to representerer store buer med sweeps 180 grader eller senere, og to representerer mindre buer med sweeps 180 grader eller mindre.

trans-unit.source: If IsLargeArc is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen.
trans-unit.target: Hvis IsLargeArc **true**, er ett av de to større bue sweeps valgte; ellers, hvis er **false**, én for mindre arc sweeps er valgt.

trans-unit.source: The remaining two arc candidates are each drawn in a different direction: <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Gjenværende to bue kandidater hver tegnes i en annen retning: <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> property specifies which one to use.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>egenskapen angir hvilket som skal brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows two elliptical arcs that are identical except for their IsLargeArc settings.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser to elliptiske buer er identiske unntatt IsLargeArc innstillingene.

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "ArcSegments with different IsLargeArc settings") ArcSegment objects with different IsLargeArc settings ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None|
trans-unit.target: ![ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger for IsLargeArc](~/add/media/arcsegment-islargearc.png "ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger for IsLargeArc") ArcSegment objekter med ulike innstillinger for IsLargeArc ## egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til **true**| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: **true** if the arc should be greater than 180 degrees; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **TRUE** Hvis buen må være større enn 180 grader; ellers, **false**.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the endpoint of the elliptical arc.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir endepunktet på elliptisk bue.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> class defines only the destination point of the arc it represents; the beginning point of the arc is the current point of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> to which the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> is added.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>klassen definerer bare målet punktet buen den representerer; startpunktet buen er gjeldende punktet i <xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure>som den <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>er lagt til.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> </xref:System.Windows.Media.PathFigure> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>

trans-unit.source: If the arc segment's start point and end point are the same, no arc is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det bue segmentet startpunktet og endepunktet er like, tegnes ingen bue.

trans-unit.source: For most arcs of a particular position, size, and rotation, there are four different arcs that can be drawn; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> properties indicate which arc to use.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes fire forskjellige buer kan tegnes; for de fleste buer for en bestemt plassering, størrelse og rotasjon den <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>egenskapene angir hvilken bue skal brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>

trans-unit.source: Of the four candidate arc sweeps, two represent large arcs with sweeps of 180 degrees or greater, and two represent smaller arcs with sweeps 180 degrees or less.
trans-unit.target: På fire candidate bue-sweeps to representerer store buer med sweeps 180 grader eller senere, og to representerer mindre buer med sweeps 180 grader eller mindre.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> is **true**, then one of the two larger arc sweeps is chosen; otherwise, if is **false**, one of the smaller arc sweeps is chosen.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>er **true**, er ett av de to større bue sweeps valgte; ellers, hvis er **false**, én for mindre arc sweeps er valgt.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>

trans-unit.source: The remaining two arc candidates are each drawn in a different direction: <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Gjenværende to bue kandidater hver tegnes i en annen retning: <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A> property specifies which one to use.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>egenskapen angir hvilket som skal brukes.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows several elliptical arcs that are identical except for their Point settings.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser flere elliptiske buer som er identisk med unntak av deres innstillinger.

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different Point settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "ArcSegments with different Point settings") Several ArcSegment objects with different Point settings ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None|
trans-unit.target: ![ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger](~/add/media/arcsegment-point.png "ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger") flere ArcSegment objekter med ulike innstillinger ## egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til **true**| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The point to which the arc is drawn.
trans-unit.target: Punktet til buen tegnes.

trans-unit.source: The default value is (0,0).
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er (0,0).

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount (in degrees) by which the ellipse is rotated about the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor (i grader) ellipsen roteres om x-aksen.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows several elliptical arcs that are identical except for their RotationAngle settings.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser flere elliptiske buer er identiske unntatt RotationAngle innstillingene.

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "ArcSegments with different RotationAngle settings") Several ArcSegment objects with different RotationAngle settings Note that, if the arc's width and height are the same, setting this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: ![ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger for RotationAngle](~/add/media/arcsegment-rotationangle.png "ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger for RotationAngle") flere ArcSegment objekter med ulike innstillinger for RotationAngle Legg merke til at bredden og høyden på bue er like, angi denne egenskapen har ingen virkning hvis.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til **true**| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The amount (in degrees) by which the ellipse is rotated about the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: Mengden (i grader) ellipsen roteres om x-aksen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x- and y-radius of the arc as a <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir x - og y-radien til buen som en <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> struktur.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows several elliptical arcs that are identical except for their Size settings.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser flere elliptiske buer er identiske bortsett fra innstillingene.

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different Size settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "ArcSegments with different Size settings") Several ArcSegment objects with different Size settings ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None|
trans-unit.target: ![ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger for størrelse](~/add/media/arcsegment-size.png "ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger for størrelse") flere ArcSegment objekter med ulike innstillinger for størrelse ## egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til **true**| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> structure that describes the x- and y-radius of the elliptical arc.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> -strukturen som beskriver x - og y-radien til elliptisk bue.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> structure's <xref:System.Windows.Size.Width*> property specifies the arc's x-radius; its <xref:System.Windows.Size.Height*> property specifies the arc's y-radius.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> strukturen for <> </> *> egenskapen angir de bue x-radius; den <> </> *> egenskapen angir de bue y-radius.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0,0.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0,0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the arc is drawn in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"></xref> direction.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om buen tegnes den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"> </xref> retning.

trans-unit.source: For an <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment> with a given <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle%2A>, start point, and end <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point%2A>, four different arcs are possible.
trans-unit.target: For en <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>med en gitt <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle%2A>startpunkt og slutte <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point%2A>, er det mulig med fire forskjellige buer.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.RotationAngle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment>

trans-unit.source: Specifying the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A> property reduces the number of possible arcs to two: an arc drawn from the start point to the end <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point%2A> in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> direction and an arc drawn from the start point to the end point in a <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> direction.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>egenskapen reduserer antall mulige buer til to: en bue trukket fra startpunktet til slutten <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point%2A>i en <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>retningen og en bue tegnes fra startpunktet til det siste punktet i en <xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection>retning.</xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.Point%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.IsLargeArc%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows two elliptical arcs that are identical except for their SweepDirection settings.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser to elliptiske buer er identiske unntatt SweepDirection innstillingene.

trans-unit.source: ![ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "ArcSegments with different SweepDirection settings") ArcSegment objects with different SweepDirection settings ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to **true**|None|
trans-unit.target: ![ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger for SweepDirection](~/add/media/arcsegment-sweepdirection.png "ArcSegments med ulike innstillinger for SweepDirection") ArcSegment objekter med ulike innstillinger for SweepDirection ## egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til **true**| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies the direction in which the arc is drawn.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir retningen som buen tegnes.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Windows.Media.SweepDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ArcSegment.SweepDirection*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
